{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = ADSL Wireless Modem Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_AAM6020VI-T4 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = AAM6020 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = VI-T4 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, dsl modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQAAM6KVIT4, M4Y-0XG650 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = AAM6030VI-T2 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;TNETD7300;TNETD7300GDU; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 4KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 150 <!-- 150 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV320ABTC-90; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4S281632F-TC75; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6060;88E6060-RCJ; |dsl_ports = 1 |voip_ports = |wan_ports = <!-- 1, --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:60:B3 |oui = 00:60:B3
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 15 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.7 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pad header |jtag = yes,, 8-pin header
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ADSL2+ |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/03/2005 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Z-Com XG-650 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Texas Instruments;TNETW1130;TNETW1130GVF; |rad1chip2 = Radia;RC2422B; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *This device is part of the [https://www.asus.com/ru/Networking/AAM6020VI_Series/ '''ASUS''' AAM6020VI series] (RU)
"AAM6030VI-T2 REV: 1.00" and "PCB MADE IN CHINA" is silkscreened on the board. :The power requirement for the device is 15VAC, 700mA, 50/60Hz.
This OUI for this device (wireless) is assumed to be 00:60:B3 (''Z-Com'').
*[https://www.ixbt.com/comm/adsl-asus-aam6020vi.shtml ''ASUS AAM6020VI-T4'' Review on '''iXBT''']
===Specifications=== *[[ASUS AAM6020VI-T4]] • [[ASUS AAM6030VI-T2]] (PCB) :CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] TNETD7300GDU :RAM: [[Samsung]] K4S281632F (16MB SDRAM) :WLAN: [[TI]] TNETW1130GVF ([[Z-Com XG-650]]) :Switch: [[Marvell]] 88E6060 ([https://www.ixbt.com/comm/adsl/asus-aam6020vi/photos/inside.jpg PCB image]) [00:60:B3]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:ASUS AAM6020VI-T4 board top.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== :[https://forum.asus.ru/viewtopic.php?f=4&t=7517 ASUS AAM6000/6010/6020 FW] *[[ASUS AAM6030VI-B1]] • *[[ASUS AAM6020BI-T4]] (Z2) • [https://www.asus.com/ru/Networking/AAM6020BI_Series/ Product page] :[[TI]] TNETD7300GDU (AR7RD) - FW Acorp LAN420M (Adam2) *[[ASUS AAM6020VI-T4]] • [[ASUS AAM6030VI-T2]] (PCB) :FCC ID: MSQAAM6KVIT4 (2005-11-03) • ''ADSL Wireless Modem Router'' *[[ASUS AAM6020VI-B6]] (6218-I2) • [https://www.asus.com/ru/Networking/AAM6020VI_Series/ Product page] :FCC ID: MSQAAM6KVIB6 (2005-08-12) • ''4-Port Wireless Ethernet Router'' :*[[ASUS WL-AM604g]] (AAM6020VI-B6) • [https://pudeev.livejournal.com/26318.html Series] :*[[ASUS AM200g]] ([[ASUS AAM6070TP-B2]]) • (ADSL/VoIP) ::FCC ID: MSQAAM6KTPB2 (2005-11-25) • ''Wireless ADSL Router'' *[[ASUS AAM6020VI-DL1]] (6218-I2) • [[D-Link DSL-2640U rev B2]] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM6348, WLAN: BCM4318, SW: BCM5325E *[[ASUS AAM6020VI-PD1]] (6218-I3) • FCC ID: MSQAAM6KVIPD1 (2007-07-19) :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM6348S, WLAN: BCM4318, SW: BCM5325E <!-- BoM, schematics :BCM4318KFBG - 196-FBGA, BCM6348SKFBG - FBGA-400, BCM5325EKQMG - MQFP-128 :SE2521A60-R - LGA-24, SDRAM 4M*16-6 3.3V - TSOPII-54, FLASH MXIC MX29LV320CBTC-90G :LOGIC GATE NC7SZ32P5X_NL - SC70, LIN REG. AMS1117 - SOT-223, LIN REG. SC1202CSTTRT - SOT223 :SW REG. MP1423DN-LF-Z - SOIC8N, OP AMP. BCM6301KSG - SO8, Vcomp. MAX809STRG - SOT23 --> *[[ASUS AAM6020VI-F1]] • ''4-Port Ethernet Switch + Wi-Fi ADSL Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/ru/Networking/AAM6020VI_Series/ Product page] :FCC ID: MSQAAM6KVIF1 (2005-11-04) • [[Infineon]] PSB 50505/ADM8262/ADM6996 *[[ASUS AAM6010EV]] (Z2) • [[TrendChip]] TC3085 (ADSL) *[[ASUS AAM6010EV-M]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM6345 (ADSL) *[[ASUS AAM6010EV-T4]] • [[TI]] TNETD7300 (ADSL2+) *[[ASUS AAM6000EV]] (G6/X1) • [[Conexant]] GS8120 (D-Link 500G) *[[ASUS AAM6000UG]] • ''ADSL USB Modem'' • [https://www.ixbt.com/comm/adsl-asus-aam6000ug.shtml Spec.] ([https://www.ixbt.com/comm/adsl/asus-aam6000ug/photos/inside.jpg PCB]) :[[Analog Devices]] AD6480JST (ADSL)/AD6485JST (USB/Eth) *[[Paradyne 6218-I2-200-0CC]] • FCC ID: MSQAAM6KVIB6 (2005-08-12) *[[Paradyne 6218-I3-58BD]] • Wireless ADSL2+ Bonded CPE :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM6358S, WLAN: BCM4318, SW: BCM5325E :FCC ID: MSQAAM6KBDBX (2007-03-07) <!-- *MSQAAM6KVIPD1 (2007-07-19) • 4-Port Wireless Ethernet Router *MSQAAM6KBDBX (2007-03-07) • Wireless ADSL 2+ Bonded CPE *MSQAAM6KTPB2 (2005-11-25) • Wireless ADSL Router *MSQAAM6KVIF1 (2005-11-04) • 4-Port Ethernet Switch + Wi-Fi ADSL Router *MSQAAM6KVIT4 (2005-11-03) • ADSL Wireless Modem Router *MSQAAM6KVIB6 (2005-08-12) • 4-Port Wireless Ethernet Router -->
